sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>false</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>sys_attachment</collection> <condition>current.table_name == "sys_certificate"</condition> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Update sys_certificate attributes</name> <order>10000</order> <priority/> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[var cgr = new GlideRecord("sys_certificate"); if(cgr.get(current.table_sys_id)) { cgr.subject = "unknown"; cgr.update(); }]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>glide.maint</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2008-05-21 22:54:03</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path/> <sys_id>0daec0920a0a0b6100bd30ccba6e6db5</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Update sys_certificate attributes</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="X.509 Certificate Management" source="com.glide.certificates">1fb3b0a43c31311068bcf327dfe37fc4</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_0daec0920a0a0b6100bd30ccba6e6db5</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-10-10 23:01:55</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>after</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=0daec0920a0a0b6100bd30ccba6e6db5"/> </record_update>
